description: Verify that the homepage loads correctly.
expected_result: Homepage title is 'E-commerce Website Template (FREEBIE)' and 'SHOP.CO' logo is displayed.

description: Verify that the 'Shop Now' button on the homepage navigates to the correct page.
expected_result: User is navigated to the shop page.

description: Verify that the category page loads correctly.
expected_result: Category page title is 'Category Page' and products are displayed.

description: Verify that the filters on the category page work correctly.
expected_result: Only T-shirts are displayed on the category page.

description: Verify that the product detail page loads correctly.
expected_result: Product details, images, and reviews are displayed.

test_name: Product Detail Page Add to Cart Test
description: Verify that the 'Add to Cart' button on the product detail page works correctly.
expected_result: Product is added to the cart and cart count is updated.

description: Verify that the cart page loads correctly.
expected_result: Cart page displays the added products and order summary.

description: Verify that the checkout button on the cart page works correctly.
expected_result: User is navigated to the checkout page.
